title: Character Concept: RanZoth, the Champion of Light and Shadow
body:
This is a really old post of mine i dug up from the NA servers and have decided to redo. with all the strange and uniqe champions going about i shall be sharing my special character i over time made up and developed around my game name. introducing RanZoth, Champion of light and shadow

Full name and title:
RanZoth Champion of light and Shadow

Who is he?:
RanZoth melee bruiser who excels at extended fights both solo and in as a team. RanZoth could be described as a doctor. jackle, Mr.hide Type of character due to his Ultimate, Enforce Equilibrium. After casting this ability RanZoth toggles between one of two modes, Light and shadow mode. changing his ability's, passive and physical appearance.

powers and ability's:

(Passive: Corrupt/Purge)

Corrupt:
he has two Passives, one for each state he is in. Corrupt allows every basic attack to add a stack of Corrupt, progressively slowing his opponent by 1% per stack stacking up to 20 and lasting 10 seconds between attacks before being expiring and being removed from the victim.  Corrupt will only apply when using a basic attack or offensive spell on a foe while in Shadow form.

Purge:
After Switching to Light form Whenever RanZoth strikes a foe with Corrupt stacks, using a basic attack or offensive spell he removes all stacks from the target and deals true damage dependent on how many stacks of Corrupt the target has, 1% max hp per stack.

Ultimate ability: Enforce Equilibrium 

Mana Cost: 100 all levels
Self target ability

Effect changes - Casting this spell switches all ability's and passive. Leveling would increase the amount of stacks per hit on a foe by +1 stack per attack.






**WORK IN PROGRESS**  {{item:3060}} 

**feel free to post your thoughts bellow and provided constructive feed back to help further develop this champion.**
